DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness safety Huaren Peritoneal Dialysate Baxter Peritoneal Dialysate , investigate proper dialysis dose Chinese CAPD patient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Evaluation Two Kinds Peritoneal Dialysate
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , parallel , control , multi-center clinical study Huaren Peritoneal Dialysate Baxter Peritoneal Dialysate.It aim investigate proper dialysis dose Chinese CAPD patients.At time , evaluate effectiveness safety Chinese product Huaren Peritoneal Dialysate peritoneal dialysis product Baxter Peritoneal Dialysate .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 , male female Patients end stage renal disease Dialysis mode : CAPD Dialysis duration : ≥30 day ≤6 month Be capable implement home dialysis Diabetic nephropathy , 3ml/min≤ residual renal GFR ≤15ml/min ; renal disease , 3ml/min≤ residual renal GFR ≤10ml/min Sign write informed consent Acute renal failure Planing receive kidney transplantation 2 year Hemodialysis Exit site infection tunnel infection Presenting 2/3 following : a. abdominal pain , turbid ascites , without fever ; b. drainage fluid WBC＞100×106/L , neutrophil ratio＞50 % ; c.culture positive/ Gram stain positive drainage fluid ; AntiHIV positive Allergic component dialysate Active , residual malignant tumor , systemic infection , liver cirrhosis , severe congestive heart failure , anemia（Hb < 80g/L） , malnutrition（Serum Alb < 28g/L） , refractory hypertension Identified peritoneal high transportation peritoneal equilibration test ( PET ) Extreme body shape ( height > 185cm height < 145cm ) , obesity ( BMI ≥ 33kg/m2 ) Poor compliance Pregnant lactating , woman childbearing age agree use effective contraceptive measure trial Has history alcoholism drug abuse ( define illegal drug ) Any circumstance patient believe unsuitable trial
